instructions: Swipe up on the Home screen to view your apps, then tap Settings . Tap Apps & notifications > Advanced > Wireless emergency alerts . Tap to turn the following settings on or off: AMBER alerts Extreme threats Severe threats Public safety messages State/local test Vibrate Alert sound

Swipe up on the Home screen to view your apps, then tap Settings . Tap Apps & notifications > See all XX apps > Gmail > Notifications . Tap the switch at the top to turn all email notifications on or off. Tap the switch next to an email address to turn notifications on or off for that email address. Tap Advanced > Additional settings in the app , then choose an email address. Tap Manage notifications > Advanced to adjust the following settings: Behavoir Sound Vibrate On lock screen Show notification dot Override Do Not Disturb
Swipe up on the Home screen to view your apps, then tap Settings . Tap Sound > Phone ringtone and choose the desired ringtone.
Swipe up on the Home screen to view your apps, then tap Contacts . Tap the desired contact, then tap the Menu icon with three dots. Tap Set ringtone , then choose the desired ringtone.
